title: User Permission Issue
description: A user reports they cannot access a feature they believe they should have access to.

tasks.description: Identify the user and their assigned user role within the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the user has a 'Standard User' role.

tasks.description: Check the permission settings for the 'Standard User' role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the feature the user wants to access is restricted to the 'Admin User' role.

tasks.description: Explain to the user that they need to contact their account administrator to request a role change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly explains the permission structure and directs the user to the appropriate internal contact.
